page.title: 18CHURCHES EAST OF CALLINGTON
page.content: Our Lady of Victories{Roman Catholic Church, which was built in Coronation Terrace, Callington in l954, has a capacity of 5O and is served from Tavistock. The adjacent hall added in l985 is the venue for small-scale social events, also the base of the {Marthas}and the meeting place of a {youth club. Harrowbarrow Methodist Church is one of a group of l5 in the Callington-Gunnislake Circuit. Erected in l842 as a Bible Christian chapel, it seats 2OO. The{Sisterhood meets there once a week, also the {Brownies}and a{chiropody clinic,}and a pre-school{playgroup}operates twice weekly.
